arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) identifying your Lambda function alias.

functionVersion.description: Lambda function version for which you are creating the alias. Pattern: `(\$LATEST|[0-9]+)`.

invokeArn.description: The ARN to be used for invoking Lambda Function from API Gateway - to be used in `aws.apigateway.Integration`'s `uri`

name.description: Name for the alias you are creating. Pattern: `(?!^[0-9]+$)([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)`

routingConfig.description: The Lambda alias' route configuration settings. Fields documented below
